pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ada Semantic Interface Specification is a published international ISO standard (ISO/IEC 15291:1999). ASIS represents a compiler independent toolset consisting of a set of standard Ada interfaces which allow extraction of information about user source programs. This information was previously only available inside the Ada compilers themselves or exported in non-standard, and thus non portable mechanisms. This particular package is adjusted for use with the FSF version of gnat compilers.
